channel.title: Article series about promotion for DJs/producers
channel.description:
Useful series of articles on promotion...
[DigitalDJTips: Zero to Hero](https://www.digitaldjtips.com/tag/zero-to-hero)
\-
Parts 1-6 of an ongoing 12-part series...
[Part 1: How To Hustle for DJ/Producer Success](https://www.digitaldjtips.com/2018/01/zero-to-hero-hustle-for-dj-producer-success/) [Part 2: How To Get Noticed Online As A DJ/Producer](https://www.digitaldjtips.com/2018/01/zero-hero-part-2-putting-content-gets-noticed/) [Part 3: How To Develop Your DJ/Producer Brand](https://www.digitaldjtips.com/2018/02/zero-to-hero-part-2-how-to-develop-your-dj-producer-brand/) [Part 4: How To Supercharge Your Facebook Page](https://www.digitaldjtips.com/2018/02/zero-to-hero-part-four-how-to-supercharge-your-dj-producer-facebook-page/) [Part 5. How To Crush It On Instagram](https://www.digitaldjtips.com/2018/03/zero-hero-part-five-crush-instagram/) [Part 6: Power Up Your DJ/Producer Twitter](https://www.digitaldjtips.com/2018/03/zero-to-hero-twitter/)

item.title: Article series about promotion for DJs/producers
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Part 2 was quite good, but three separate articles for Facebook/Instagram/Twitter…
I really miss the days before social media.

Read full topic
item.source: Article series about promotion for DJs/producers
